1302700.name: Realm of the hero
1302700.description:
You are a hero. Strengthen yourself before fighting very strong bosses.
Try to learn skills and equip weapons in the adventure.

Everything in this game like JRPG is random.
Choose one in many classes to destroy enemies.

Features:
-6 difficulty levels (easy, normal, hard, hell, nightmare, realm of the hero)
-18 classes (Novice, Warrior, Witch, Swordman, Archer, Martial Artist, Thief, Priest, Mage fighter, Samurai, Ninja, Kunoichi, Angel, Fallen angel, Fairy, Devil, Vampire, Exorcist)
-224 skills
-77 items
